projectPhase.title: Project Status
projectPhase.info: This project is currently in the development phase. All information is subject to change.

hackathonInfo.title: Hackathon Project
hackathonInfo.text: This project was developed as part of a hackathon on devpost.com. It is a prototype implementation created during the competition.

creativeInfo.title: A Note from the Team
creativeInfo.text: Kaizer is being built with passion, coffee, and a vision to make learning smarter and more fun. Stay tuned for exciting updates!
